changes: Updated type annotation for response_format parameter
Added support for Pydantic BaseModel as a response format type
Enhanced docstring with more detailed explanation and example

patterns_discovered: Use of Protocol for defining abstract interfaces
Leveraging type hints to provide more structured output options
Integration of Pydantic models for type validation
gotchas_discovered: Potential complexity in handling different response formats
Need for clear documentation when introducing flexible type annotations

approach_outcome.impact: Enhanced type safety and flexibility in LLM response handling

recommendations: Add runtime type checking for BaseModel response_format
Consider adding more comprehensive error handling for different response format types
Create comprehensive unit tests for the new type annotation flexibility
